message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $11,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm willing to go. How about we meet closer to the middle at $13,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $12,000? I really think this product would be a great fit for me, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment if we can come to a mutually agreeable price.
